name: Goblin Race
description:
This game is a study made inside Unreal Engine 5. It was made in about a week.

It consists in a time trial racing game, the goal is simple. Get to the checkpoint as fast as you can. The main goal for this project was to execute techniques like camera shake, sound design and actor blueprints. 

Commands:

w - foward 

a - left

s - backward

d - right
